{"id":1187723155,"question_id":3251,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â weeks","timestamp":1709040474,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1187723155/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Area of Longest Diagonal Rectangle","memory":"29.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int areaOfMaxDiagonal(vector<vector<int>>& dimensions) {\n        int ma = 0, ans = 0;\n        for(auto v: dimensions){\n            if(ma < v[0] * v[0] + v[1] * v[1]){\n                ma = v[0] * v[0] + v[1] * v[1];\n                ans = v[0] * v[1];\n            }else if(ma == v[0] * v[0] + v[1] * v[1]) ans = max(ans, v[0] * v[1]);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-area-of-longest-diagonal-rectangle","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
